name: Hive
description: Officially licensed version of the "Mensa Select" award-winning board game! Hive is a board game with a difference. There is no board! The pieces are added to the playing area thus creating the board.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP or better Процессор: 1 gHz Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: OpenGL 2.1+ w/ GL_ARB_framebuffer_object Место на диске: 300 MB
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows XP or better Процессор: 2 gHz Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: OpenGL 3+ Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету Место на диске: 300 MB

reviews.review_text: Plays like chess. But, with a twist. Its a must have for all strategy gamers.

Strongly recommended! Especially for people who like mentally demanding board games like chess...  It definitely needs some more polish in some areas, more comfort, more options and so on, but the base game works great, i have lots of fun with it, the computer is very strong and theres online play with elo ranking

The 'real' HIVE is a great board game, which is the 6th in the abstract games rank at BoardGameGeek; this videogame is perfect trasposition of it, so for the transitive property, we have a great videogame.  The interface is smooth and polish; the graphics are beatiful, the sounds are immersive and fit well in the mood of the game. On top, we have ALL the expansions available, hence mosquito, ladybug, pillbug.  Regarding other option, the multiplayer game works very well, but it's a great shame that there are very few opponents to play with.  The AI, considering how complex is a game like HIVE, is fairly good but I've played too few matches to judge it and I'm a novice player.  What I said until now are the PROS, obviously there are little CONS.  The multiplayer game is only syncronous, maybe an asyncronous mode will be very useful, considering the penury of online opponents.   The camera has an auto-zoom function that controls zoom-in/zoom-out in automatic way. Very often it works well, but I prefer the option to disable it and take the control of the camera to choose the % of desidered zoom level.  In concljusion if you like board games, abstract games or -simply- funny games, buy HIVE and join our little group of HIVE players!
A very interesting strategy board game! The variation between bug types offers quite a challenge. Definitely recommend for anyone who is into 'chess-likes'.

If you like the meat space version of this game you will like the video game version. The AI provides a good challenge and you can play online against other people. It also allows you to custom the look of the pieces (carbon, classic, animated). The only problem is that you have to pay extra for the mosquito, ladybug, and pillbug pieces. Overall very well done.
I own and played this game on another account, and bought it again, with all DLC. Yes, its that good.  If you like to combine thniking and fun, this the the game for you!  Absolutely recommended!

50% chess 50% insects (not bugs)   I own the tabletop version, so I purchased this one only cause I was curious about playing it on the web. Hope it's bugless. To be honest, I purchased it only for make bad puns in a recension. Back on serious businnes, now with asyncronous play it should be easier to play with opponents, but I have to admit I haven't tryed multiplayer yet (too much games, too less time). If you love chess, buy this game. Also, the grasshopper sound in the menu could help you sleep better in winter, make you pretending it's summer.
Great port to the PC of a great board game. Especially with the addition of asynchronous play, I can definitely recommend this game.
What's the difference between Santa Claus and a Jew?     A: Santa Claus goes down the chimney.
Great client for a fantastic board game!   The one feature I'd like is a 'play this opponent again' button. Being forced back to the lobby, and re-inviting the same friend is just janky.
